name: Broken Mirror (r4v3nm1nd)
description:
You’re new in a new city.

You’re looking for something new and different in your life.

A Malkavian sets his sights on you.

But that’s nothing new.

Tonight, you might find what you’re looking for.

Or it might find you.

 

         FEATURES

  • Customize your name.
  • Make choices that changes absolutely nothing.
  • Become jobless and aimless.
  • Enjoy the possible grammar errors.
  • Argue with yourself.
  • See beyond the broken mirrors.
